knimeNode.name: DFG Miner
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node is created to discover a directly-follows graph from an event log.

fullDescription.intro: This node is created to discover a directly-follows graph. It accepts an event log as input and generates a directly-follows graph as output. In this package without notification, directly-follows graph is abbreviated as DFG. A DFG is composed of activities in rectangles, which are connected by arcs for directly-follows relation. The green rectangles represent the start activities, while the red ones are for the end activities.
fullDescription.option: The classifier chosen to classify the event log. The event log classifiers from event log and event attributes can be used as classifier.
The variant type used to extract one directly-follows graph from event log. There are three options.
